General.commands:
ping
help
version
about
find
uinfo

ping.name: ping
ping.description: Gets the current latency of the bot.

help.name: help
help.description: Gets a list of commands, or shows information about a command.

version.name: version
version.description: Shows the current bot version (of the prefix used.)

ver.name: version
ver.description: Shows the current bot version (of the prefix used.)

about.name: about
about.description: Gives information and credits, as well as the current version support for the bot.

name.name: name
name.description: Sets the name for the bot to refer to you as.

gender.name: gender
gender.description: Sets the gender for the bot to refer to you as.

placevalue.name: placevalue
placevalue.description: Temporary alpha command to see that the placevalue function works as intended.

uinfo.name: uinfo
uinfo.description: Get information on a particular user.

uptime.name: uptime
uptime.description: See how long Precipitation has been online.

lswarn.name: lswarn
lswarn.description: See your current warnings, or see someone else's.

rmwarn.name: rmwarn
rmwarn.description: Remove a warning from a user.
